name: Payment Methods Icon Set
description:
A set of the 39 most used icons for your next e-commerce checkout form. With special attention paid to following the brands guidelines to ensure proper recognition of the payment services in any size.


Enjoying this file?

☕ Buy Me a Coffee


Have any feedback or suggestions? Feel free to leave a comment in a comments section.


Oct 28 2021 Update:

I’ve updated all cards to be variables of the same Payment Method component, added extra size, and updated PayPal logo to follow official guidelines. You can select any payment method by adjusting variable Method and you can select between 48px, 24px, or 16px size by adjusting variable Size. I have also created a Color Style for the border. You can easily change all borders of your icons by simply adjusting that color style. ✌️
